entries.meaning:
(mathematics, of a number) Belonging to the sequence generated by the formula 
  
    
      
        
          
            
              5
              
                n
                
                  2
                
              
              −
              3
              n
            
            2
          
        
      
    
    {\displaystyle {\frac {5n^{2}-3n}{2}}}
  
.
